name: The Pest In The GlareCrow's Nest
name_original: The Pest In The GlareCrow's Nest
description:
BEFORE ANYTHING: THIS GAME REQUIRES A ZIP OPENER IN ORDER TO OPEN THE FILE AND PLAY!!!!!!

The Point Of The Game: This game is all about traversing a corn maze and memorizing areas of the map in order to find keys through process of elimination, and then you may be able to escape... The key locations are randomized each run, and so is the searching pattern of the creature

The Creature: Within this Corn Maze lurks a Creature trying to Hunt you down because you are eating too much of the corn without sharing

The Player: You play in a first person perspective, searching for 4 keys, Which Spawn Randomly throughout the Corn Field each try

What must I press within this video game...To exit the game you must press the Escape/ESC Key  ..Press W,A,S,D or Up Arrow, Down Arrow, Right Arrow, Left Arrow in order to move... and move your mouse in order to look around.. ITS THAT SIMPLE!!! :O

If you want my recommendation how to play the game then I would suggest to play this game at night in a Dark Room... Have Fun!!!

I should mention there is no main menu, meaning that when you startup the game you get right into the gameplay... As of now

Future Plans List:

{

2. Maybe Split Screen 1V1 (Probably not but we will see)

4. More Map layouts

5. A Lantern Item for players with screens that are too dark

6. The Creature will check where the last Key Collected Location was

7. A Ringing Sound notification when the player is close to a key

8. More Screenshots and a Video to show off what the game is about in the main menu (Very Soon)

}

It Would Be Amazingly Helpful if you could leave a review on this game and share what you liked and what you disliked within this game so that I may be able to improve in the future... Thank you!!!
